conbody.p: To create a task that directs a student to perform an exercise, use the <learningContent> topic type to introduce the material. You can provide introductory text to the exercise inside the <learningContentbody> element. The task itself should be a nested topic after the <learningContentbody> element. Below is a simplified example. For more examples, look at the course2 files.
